biography.bio: Ferenc Táray was born on December 24, 1884 in Tápiószele, Hungary as Ferenc Bundialek. He was an actor, known for Dreams of Love (1935), Csak növel ne! (1924) and The Old Scoundrel (1932). He was married to Edit Dullien and Margit Molnár. He died on April 3, 1961 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Ferenc Táray

biography.bio: Mária Sulyok was born on April 24, 1908 in Királyhida, Austria-Hungary as Szautner Mária. She was an actress, known for Men and Banners (1965), Love, Emilia (1970) and Dreams of Love (1935). She was married to Sándor Gál and Béla Elek. She died on October 20, 1987 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Mária Sulyok

biography.bio: Giza Báthory was born on April 14, 1881 in Budapest, Hungary as Gizella Baumann. She was an actress, known for Dreams of Love (1935), Ungarische Rhapsodie (1928) and A csodadoktor (1926). She was married to László Z. Molnár. She died on April 16, 1941 in Budapest.
biography.name: Giza Báthory

biography.bio: László Z. Molnár was born on June 23, 1883 in Zombor, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for A sárga árnyék (1920), The Colonel (1917) and Dreams of Love (1935). He was married to Giza Báthory. He died on November 1, 1956 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: László Z. Molnár

biography.bio: Béla Fáy was born on June 8, 1901 in Érsekújvár, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Dreams of Love (1935), Gentryfészek (1942) and Zavaros éjszaka (1940). He died on November 8, 1984 in Baden bei Wien, Austria.
biography.name: Béla Fáy

biography.bio: Géza Földessy was born on April 13, 1905 in Szombathely, Hungary. He was an actor, known for Dreams of Love (1935), La Habanera (1937) and I May See Her Once a Week (1937). He was married to Juci Komlós. He died in 2001 in France.
biography.name: Géza Földessy

biography.bio: György Dénes was born on July 2, 1898 in Budapest, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Renee XIV (1946), Hazugság nélkül (1946) and Dreams of Love (1935). He was married to Gizi Lengyel. He died on April 14, 1962 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: György Dénes

biography.bio: József Kürthy was born on July 14, 1881 in Szatmárnémeti, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for The Red Purse (1917), Lúdas Matyi (1922) and A csikós (1917). He died on June 18, 1939 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: József Kürthy

biography.bio: Tibor Halmay was born on December 20, 1894 in Nagyszentmiklós, Austria-Hungary. He is known for his work on Egy bolond százat csinál (1942), The Old Scoundrel (1932) and Boy, the Noszty (1938). He died on February 3, 1944 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Tibor Halmay

biography.bio: Gyula Gózon was born on March 13, 1885 in Érsekújvár, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Ifjú szívvel (1953), Az ember néha téved (1938) and Hyppolit, the Butler (1931). He was married to Lili Berky. He died on October 8, 1972 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Gyula Gózon

biography.placeOfBirth: Kassa, Hungary, Austria-Hungary [now Kosice, Slovak Republic]
biography.bio: Sándor Pethes was born on May 28, 1899 in Kassa, Hungary, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Tanár úr, kérem... (1956), Göre Gábor visszatér (1940) and Estélyi ruha kötelezö (1942). He was married to Bondy, Lídia. He died on June 29, 1981 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Sándor Pethes

biography.bio: Zoltán Závodszky was born on July 18, 1892 in Bátorkeszi, Hungary. He is known for his work on Dreams of Love (1935) and Zenés TV színház (1970). He died on October 8, 1976 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Zoltán Závodszky

biography.bio: Eszter Rethy was born on October 22, 1912 in Budapest, Austria-Hungary as Riedler Ibolya. She was an actress, known for Estélyi ruha kötelezö (1942), Dreams of Love (1935) and Salzburg, die Festspielstadt (1939). She died on January 28, 2004 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Eszter Rethy

biography.bio: Gitta Csatho was born in 1896 in Budapest, Hungary. She is an actress, known for Dreams of Love (1935).
biography.name: Gitta Csatho

biography.bio: Karola Zala was born on October 1, 1879 in Nagyvárad, Hungary. She was an actress, known for Professor Hannibal (1956), Spring Shower (1932) and Unknown Opponent (1940). She died on January 13, 1970 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Karola Zala
